EN: You have proven yourself a true hunter, a master of killing, and so with great pleasure I will give you the reward you deserve...

Tiny squib... You approach fearless. Are you a hunter like me?<page>Do you feel the urge inside, to stalk, to kill, to understand?<page>Then take it! My journal. It will aid you. At first the text may seem difficult to discern, but a learned hunter will come to understand its words.<page>Venture the depths of this land and slay its beasts. Prove yourself worthy to bear the mark of Hunter.

So, you've encountered all of the beasts in this land. Impressive! But one task remains, little squib.<page>Keep hunting down creatures until you have deciphered all of my notes! Only then will I recognise you as my fellow Hunter and you shall receive your reward.
Little squib! You may have overcome a few creatures, but you are only just beginning.<page>Don't delay, descend into the belly of this world and hunt down the life you find!
Ah ha! Your journal grows fat and full. Only those last few, rare beasts remain left to stalk.<page>Search the kingdom's corners. Complete the journal. Earn your well deserved reward...
You have my mark, and you shall be recognised as one of my rare caste. Fellow Hunter, I have nothing else to give you.
Ahhh... I knew I'd seen it right. That hunter's quality. Hallownest's creatures fall in your path.<page>Don't stop now little squib, many more there are to find, and stalk, and kill.

Your journal... let me see it!<page>Yes... Yes! The Hunter's journal is complete!<page>You have proven yourself a true hunter, a master of killing, and so with great pleasure I will give you the reward you deserve...

Fellow Hunter. You return? You've already proven yourself to me. I'm only biding time a moment, before next my hunt begins.<page>A true Hunter has no home, no kingdom and I'm eager for new prey.<page>You bear the mark now, but that's only the beginning. That mark will become a part of you, will engrave itself deep within, and that yearning to hunt... It will never leave.
It is stronger even than me... does it know that? Will it return to hunt me...? I hope it tries.
